description: Bold Routes, a leader in real estate consultancy, marketing, and brokerage, celebrated the end of the first quarter of this year with a significant milestone. The company proudly announced the opening of its 10th branch, a regional office strategically located in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates. Regarded as one of the most successful and largest […]
title: Bold Routes launches its first regional office in Dubai

description: As a part of the “Decent Life” initiative by President Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi, Egypt’s Ministry of Health and Population has initiated 90 free medical convoys across various governorates, from 16 to 30 April. Hossam Abdel Ghaffar, the spokesperson for the Ministry, stated that these convoys are aimed at border governorates and remote villages, adhering strictly […]
title: Egypt’s Ministry of Health initiates 90 free medical convoys

description: Our nation's security and stability threatened due to Gaza war, says Al-Sisi
title: Egypt, Bahrain vow joint action to end Gaza crisis

description: City Farm, an Egyptian enterprise renowned for exporting frozen vegetables to the US, is embarking on an ambitious expansion strategy. This plan is set to broaden its market reach, starting with Kenya and extending into the European continent. The strategy includes diversifying its product range and increasing land reclamation efforts. Mahmoud Lamei, CEO of City […]
title: City Farm sets sights on Kenyan market for African expansion

description: Egyptian President Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi and his Serbian counterpart Aleksandar Vucic on Wednesday reaffirmed their strong historical ties and commitment to further strengthening bilateral relations. The two leaders spoke by phone, discussing a range of issues including regional developments, particularly the ongoing situation in the Middle East. Al-Sisi emphasized the urgency of an immediate ceasefire […]
title: Egypt, Serbia leaders vow to bolster ties, discuss Mideast, Ukraine crises

description: The Seventh International Conference of the Faculty of Media at the British University in Egypt (BUE), titled “Media Economic Models in the Digital Age: Trends and Challenges,” was inaugurated by prominent Egyptian journalist and media figure Karam Gabr, who serves as the Chairperson of Egypt’s Supreme Council for Media Regulation.  The conference brought together 25 […]
title: Karim Gabr inaugurates 7th International Conference of BUE’s Faculty of Media

description: Annual headline urban inflation declines to 33.3% during March compared to 35.7% in February
title: Inflation drop in March: CBE highlights subdued price trends amid exchange rate changes

description: The Administrative Capital for Urban Development (ACUD) has entered into a strategic memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Dongba Town of China. This agreement is aimed at the reciprocal exchange of expertise, advanced technology, and management practices to enhance the diplomatic quarter of Egypt’s New Administrative Capital (NAC) and Beijing’s fourth embassy district. This MoU is […]
title: Egypt’s ACUD, China’s Dongba Town forge partnership to bolster NAC’s Diplomatic Quarter

description: Rahmi highlights MSMEDA’s role in national initiatives to curb youth illegal immigration
title: MSMEDA commits EGP 185.2m to Dakahleya’s infrastructure development

description: The Engineering Export Council of Egypt (EECE) has announced the participation of 18 Egyptian companies at the Canton Fair in Guangzhou, China. This event, running from 15 to 19 April 2024, features sectors including household appliances, electrical devices, and kitchenware. This initiative aligns with the council’s strategy to penetrate international markets, boost exports, and stay […]
title: 18 Egyptian engineering companies showcase at China’s Canton Fair

description: Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly convened with Basil Rahmi, CEO of the Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprise Development Agency (MSMEDA), to assess the agency’s progress in fostering projects and entrepreneurship, as well as to discuss future strategies. Prime Minister Madbouly began the meeting by highlighting the critical role of MSMEDA, especially considering the significant influence of […]
title: MSMEDA’s strategic push: EGP 6.347bn injected to empower small, micro enterprises in Egypt
